comment: The status_command option is a script run through sh. Every time a
full line is printed, it is displayed in the bottom-right. This can
be used to display any information you would like in text form. This
example command prints the battery level, updated every 30 seconds.
status_command: while true; do echo Your battery is at $(cat /sys/class/power_supply/BAT0/capacity)%; sleep 30; done
